meanings.definition: The act or practice of being a wonk.
meanings.sent1: Her wonkery in the library impressed everyone with her knowledge.
meanings.sent2: His wonkery on the subject made him the go-to person for information.
meanings.sent3: The wonkery of the bookworm was unmatched in the entire school.
meanings.sent4: His wonkery shone brightly in the field of research and analysis.
meanings.sent5: The wonkery of the scientist was evident in every experiment conducted.

meanings.definition: Excessive attention to detail or technicalities, especially in politics or policy analysis.
meanings.sent1: The wonkery of the politician often led to delays in decision-making.
meanings.sent2: Her wonkery in policy analysis was both impressive and time-consuming.
meanings.sent3: The wonkery of the team caused them to overlook the bigger picture.
meanings.sent4: His wonkery in politics made him a valuable asset during debates.
meanings.sent5: The wonkery of the analyst uncovered hidden flaws in the system.
